title: Give teambuilding an extra lift at Ellenborough Park
text:
Give teambuilding an extra lift at Ellenborough Park Give teambuilding an extra lift at Ellenborough Park Details   10:15 Hands on experience with a Hot Air Balloon It’s time to take blue-sky thinking to the next level with Ellenborough Park’s hot air balloon build challenge. Learn how hot air balloons work by assembling the basket, burners and balloon together as a team with expert guidance from Ellenborough Park’s teambuilding specialists, Cotswold Balloon Safaris. For a competitive edge, set the clock against two or more teams and see how fast the basket and burners can be paired up, with the stopwatch paused once the burners have been ignited and a blast of flame sent 30ft into the air. 
Cotswold Balloon Safaris instructors’ take all delegates through the theory and fascinating facts behind ballooning and full instruction on building and breaking down is provided. Sian Thomas, event manager at Ellenborough Park, said: “Building a hot air balloon is an amazing test of teamwork skills and this is a unique proposition for delegate activities in the UK, giving companies and employees an away day filled with camaraderie and competition for all levels of fitness and ability” Prices start from £55 per person for hot air balloon teambuilding at Ellenborough Park and are based on a minimum of 15 delegates, session timings based on individual requirements (costs and timings may vary depending on delegate numbers, length of session and date(s) of your event.
